abstract: Central Park's Summer Stage concert series, which began in 1986, has since expanded to all five boroughs and encompasses many genres and styles.
lead_paragraph: SummerStage, celebrating its 30th season, has expanded to all five boroughs and many more genres.

headline.main: In a Musical Milestone, All the City’s a Stage
headline.print_headline: In a Musical Milestone, All the City’s a Stage

snippet: SummerStage, celebrating its 30th season, has expanded to all five boroughs and many more genres.
